message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm initially offering it for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is closer to its true market value.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $12,000. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
